short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e: Stylish Scroll - allows you to custom the appearance of scrollbars
short.cs: Stylish Scroll - umožňuje přizpůsobit vzhled posuvníků
short.da: Stylish Scroll - giver dig mulighed for at tilpasse udseendet af rullepaneler
short.de: Stylish Scroll - ermöglicht es, das Erscheinungsbild von Scrollleisten anzupassen
short.es,es_419: Stylish Scroll - te permite personalizar la apariencia de las barras de desplazamiento
short.fr: Stylish Scroll - vous permet de personnaliser l'apparence des barres de défilement
short.ru: Stylish Scroll - позволяет настроить внешний вид полос прокрутки
short.uk: Stylish Scroll - дозволяє налаштовувати вигляд смуг прокручування

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stylish Scroll - allows you to change the appearance of scroll bars, making them unique, stylish and adapted to your preferences.
Instead of the usual design, you can choose a scroll from a collection of images created specifically for the extension.

The collection includes many thematic options that will be constantly updated, textures and designs - from minimalism to bright seasonal themes.
For example, add a festive mood with the help of winter scrolls.
Next, we will do what you can do to customize the color. Stylish Scroll works on most websites, except for browser store pages, such as the Chrome Web Store. Thanks to the user-friendly interface, setup takes only a few minutes.
Add a custom scroll to every website you visit!
